description:
Things don’t look good for Team Japan. France is a tough contender, and the judge is more interested in explaining his origins than judging the bread! Can Kazuma’s Ja-pan #21 pull through?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3 Ji no Oyatsu!! Japan 21 Gou ja!
3時のおやつ!! ジャぱん21号じゃッ!
Three O`Clock Is Snack Time!! This Is Ja-pan #21!
ของว่างตอนตีสาม! เจปังหมายเลข21!
